title: What requirement is used in the modern farming method? - Quora

response.answer_text: The no. of requirements used in modern farming are many and they include first scientific knowledge about different disciplines of agriculture like crops, animal husbandry, dairying, fishing, poultry, marketing and what not with constant touch with experts from these areas of specialisation. The farmer must have resources to purchase all the equipments and machinery required for the farm to run the show. Another important requirement is the proper management of time and labour. The requirements for mixed farming will be more than in case of mono-farming.
